title: Advanced ECMO Nursing Board Game-Based Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Critical Care Nursing and Understanding of ECMO Equipment
context.additional_context: Establishment of interactive learning environments using digital devices. Team-based project implementation for applying actual ICU scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can explain the physiological principles and clinical application procedures of ECMO equipment with 90% accuracy
Learners can accurately diagnose and respond to high-risk ECMO complication cases in board game simulations with over 85% accuracy
Through team-based PBL projects, learners develop ECMO patient management protocols applicable to real clinical settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
